title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2605.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2605.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to provide
the rules and procedures for the New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation (corporation) to provide financial assistance from the New York

State Pipeline For Jobs State Revolving Fund (the fund), created by chapter 624
of the Laws of 1999, for the planning, design and construction of projects to
create, improve or extend water supply facilities, including, but not limited
to, drinking water facilities and cold water supply facilities, for economic
development purposes. (b) This Part
applies to all project sponsors seeking or receiving financial assistance from
the fund and to the activities of the corporation in the discharge of its
duties related to the administration and management of the
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2605.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
